channel.title: The Great Prim Sword [100% by me and prim's] [ please see]
channel.description:
hi moparscape,
i made my secound model today and i called it the great prim sword look below:
side view with wireframe: [IMG]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/6708/theg8primswordsideview.png[/img]
front view with wireframe: [IMG]http://img709.imageshack.us/img709/4299/theg8primsword.png[/img]
wilded: [IMG]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/662/theg8primswordwilded.png[/img]
hope you guys like/loved it if you did please leave a comment bellow telling me how it is thanks! ;D :D

item.dc:creator: @CerealKiller CerealKiller
item.description:
@CerealKiller wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:22, topic:380486”][quote author=CerealKiller link=topic=476314.msg3483830#msg3483830 date=1296384333]

Great job!
[/quote]thank you for that i wanna rep ++ u !!

please stop. It really looks like you’re insinuating that you want someone to rep you so you’re able to rep others.[/quote]ok sorry

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:14, topic:380486”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=476314.msg3483366#msg3483366 date=1296352403]

For a starter you’re ahead of some others. Dont triangulate your models before posting them, it makes the wireframe look messy.

:mad: Are you implying me!?!?
[/quote]
I’m not implying it is you, I’m talking about the models people do blindfolded and shit out colors on it.[/quote]

It’s ok, you can imply me i don’t mind.

Read full topic

item.title: The Great Prim Sword [100% by me and prim's] [ please see]
item.dc:creator: @CerealKiller CerealKiller
item.description:
@CerealKiller wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:5, topic:380486”]Hmm… ok well where to start. The blade is too thick, The handle is too small and all in all its plain. Not trying ot be mean im just stating the things that need to be fixed. Although you did get a good shape on the blade (other then the thickness) so yer, keep up the good work. :)[/quote]well thanks this is my secound model and thanks for every1 that think’s i can do better !!! ;D :rolleyes: :eek:

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:6, topic:380486”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=476314.msg3483306#msg3483306 date=1296349669]
Hmm… ok well where to start. The blade is too thick, The handle is too small [b]and all in all its plain.[b] Not trying ot be mean im just stating the things that need to be fixed. Although you did get a good shape on the blade (other then the thickness) so yer, keep up the good work.
[/quote]
XD your catch phrase again[/quote]
Enjoy it!!! lol

Read full topic
